StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GenerateSchoolPro.le]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolYear int AS
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
BEGIN TRANSACTION
INSERT INTO HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE (SCHOOL_CODE, SCHOOL_YEAR, PRIORITY_CODE, STATUS_CODE, ACCESS_CODE, RECRUITER_ID, PERCENT_TO_COLLEGE, MALE_SENIORS, FEMALE_SENIORS, ASVAB_RESP, ASVAB_MONTH, ASVAB_NUM, SCHEDULED_GRAD_DATE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) SELECT HSP.SCHOOL_CODE, @SchoolYear AS SCHOOL_YEAR, HSP.PRIORITY_CODE, HSP.STATUS_CODE, HSP.ACCESS_CODE, HSP.RECRUITER_ID, 0 AS PERCENT_TO_COLLEGE, 0 AS MALE_SENIORS, 0 AS FEMALE_SENIORS, HSP.ASVAB_RESP, HSP.ASVAB_MONTH, HSP.ASVAB_NUM, DATEADD(YEAR, 1, HSP.SCHEDULED_GRAD_DATE) AS NEW_SCHEDULED_GRAD_DATE, 'HSPro.leJob' AS USER_LOGIN, GETDATE() AS UPDATE_DATE FROM HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE HSP WHERE HSP.SCHOOL_YEAR = (@SchoolYear - 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE HSP1 WHERE HSP1.SCHOOL_CODE = HSP.SCHOOL_CODE AND HSP1.SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear)
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN --- IF THE INSERT FAILED, ROLLBACK THE TRANSACTION AND RAISE AN ERROR ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred genera.ng the HS Pro.les for School Year ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), @SchoolYear) + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END ELSE BEGIN --- IF THE INSERT WAS SUCCESSFUL, COMMIT THE TRANSACTION COMMIT TRANSACTION END
